satu: Invoke the power of the Hist to recover health ten times faster for 60 seconds.
dua: Your Argonian blood is 50 percent resistant to disease.

satu: Absorb 50 percent of magicka from hostile spells for 60 seconds.
dua: Breton blood grants a 25 percent resistance to magic.

satu: For 60 seconds, opponents that get too close take 8 points per second of fire damage.
dua: Your Dunmer blood gives you 50 percent resistance to fire.
